TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AppEvents_SheetBeforeDoubleClickEventHandler(object Sh, Range Target, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed AppEvents_SheetBeforeDoubleClickEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AppEvents_SheetBeforeDoubleClickEventHandler(Sh As Object, Target As Range, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void AppEvents_SheetBeforeDoubleClickEventHandler(System::Object ^ Sh, Range ^ Target, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

param.name: Sh
param.span: Objeto Worksheet que representa la hoja.

span.span: A Worksheet object that represents the sheet.

param.name: Target
param.span: La celda más cercana al puntero del mouse (ratón) cuando se hace doble clic.

span.span: The cell nearest to the mouse pointer when the double-click occurred.

param.name: Cancel
param.span: False cuando se produce el evento. Si el procedimiento de evento establece este argumento en True, el valor predeterminado, haga doble clic en acción no se realiza al finalizar el procedimiento.

span.span: False when the event occurs. If the event procedure sets this argument to True, the default double-click action isn't performed when the procedure is finished.

summary.span: Un tipo de delegado que se usa para agregar un controlador de eventos para el (evento).

span.span: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event.

summary.span: SheetBeforeDoubleClick (evento) se produce cuando se hace doble clic, cualquier hoja de cálculo antes de que el valor predeterminado, haga doble clic en acción.

span.span: The SheetBeforeDoubleClick event occurs when any worksheet is double-clicked, before the default double-click action.
